boardgame.name: Pyx's Pandemonium Pit
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

A hag who has what your party needs, garrulous ghosts seeking to litigate ancient grudges, a demon bound to a statue, and more!

A system agnostic adventure site for your favorite fantasy RPG!

boardgame.name: The Tomb of Xul Lan Kwat
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

10,000 years ago the god-queen Xul Lan Kwat was buried here, but her leaking dreams now threaten the world above. Animals and people awake to their hair falling out, their skin turns translucent white, their eye sockets closing over. You have been given a lead chest in which you must seal the god-queen’s brain and heart to stop the flow of dreams.

A 19-room statless dungeon for the Dyson Logos Jam featuring 12-foot mushroom women, needle-toothed poop-flinging pale monkeys, ritual cannibal gnomes, mutations, and an faint echo of the ancient god-queen Xul Lan Kwat herself.

boardgame.name: RaceKart Riot: Rainbow Galaxy
boardgame.description:
Rainbow Galaxy is a very unique track in the sense that there are multiple tracks to choose from, each with slightly different lengths and spaces to land on. This track will keep you coming back as you discover which path is ideal for you!

The first new racer is Sonico Oxblade! Instead of driving a normal racekart, Sonico found the fastest Ostrich alive and trained him until he was fast enough to keep up with the fastest of racekarts!

The the second new racer is Fabio! Originally a bodybuilder, Fabio was told that for whatever reason, he just looked like he should be a racer. Only time will tell if he can live up to everyone's racing expectations of him!

—description from the publisher

Includes 1 additional track and 2 more racers.

boardgame.name: Regidice
boardgame.description:
Regidice is a cooperative game where 2 to 4 players work together to defeat three powerful enemies.

Players take turns to roll dice, pick actions and attack the three enemies, represented by black dice. Once enough damage is dealt, the enemy is defeated. The players win when the last enemy is defeated. But beware! Each turn the enemy strikes back.

Players will discard dice to satisfy the damage and if they can't discard enough, everyone loses!

—description from the designer

For a different take on the same theme, with players cooperating to take on one enemy at a time in increasing difficulty but using cards instead of dice, also see Regicide, from the same designers.

boardgame.name: Battletech: Battle of Tukayyid Supplemental
boardgame.description:
The Battle of Tukayyid campaign book brings the pivotal conflict of the Clan Invasion to life in stunning grandeur. But the Tukayyid experience is too exciting to be contained in a single volume, and this Supplemental expands upon the options within that book.

Two sections dig further into BattleTech lore, allowing players to use the full range of mapsheets and record sheets published to date, while a Battlefield Support: Combined Arms Worksheet makes those rules easier to use.

Additionally, over two hundred record sheets cover every ’Mech included in the Battle of Tukayyid campaign book. Finally, a Strategic BattleForce expansion includes the rules, maps, and Formation Record Sheets to use the rules in Interstellar Operations to play out the Battle of Tukayyid with large-scale games.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Saloon Showdown: Back in Town
boardgame.description:
Back in town is an expansion for Saloon Showdown, that adds "skills" to all the characters in the game, for greater depth of gameplay and replayability!

The ranks of the gunslingers in the base game are also joined by the Sheriff and the Farrier, two very special characters. The Sheriff wears the real Sheriff's star, and makes extra bucks if she manages to keep it to herself. The Ferrier is a powerful character who can interrupt the game (almost) any time, by throwing his hammer to other players, in order to collect their bounties.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne Jump
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The mystery of the Elder Crossing is all but over. Elder Dragons have always crossed the sea to the New World every one hundred years so they may lay themselves to rest within the Rotten Vale, their bioenergy fueling the cycle of life across the continent, carried through its veins - the Everstream. The recent phenomenon of increased migrations seems to have been the meddling of a powerful nascent being identified as Xeno’jiiva, luring large numbers of other Elder Dragons to perish, overcharging the Everstream (particularly the central Elder’s Recess) with bioenergy and feeding it with the strength of countless natural disasters. And the tale yet spins, as the energetic Research Commission persists in the New World to keep discovering and documenting, and another song will soon begin.

boardgame.name: The Darkwatch
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Evil... as old as time. Spreads like a plague, corrupting the hearts of men. For millennia, there have been those who have stood against it, a secret organization to protect mankind. They are the frontline in an unholy war. They are...

...The Darkwatch'

boardgame.name: Ashes of Power Expanded Content
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

This is supplemental material for Ashes of Power, first released for Free RPG Day 2021. It is not designed as stand-alone content.

User summary:

This free download expands some of the encounters in the published scenario, provides a general clue table, a map, and provides two additional pre-generated characters.

boardgame.name: Ryozen
boardgame.description:
Ryozen is a 2-4 player worker placement game with a layered rotating board and multiple scoring and resources engines, set in a fantasy world of mystical forces and animals with extraordinary abilities.

It's a busy time in the kingdom of Ryozen! Like all the others, your clan has assembled the most skilled kin who can perform various tasks and bring you the honors you deserve. These are the final nights, when you can prove that your clan is the most capable of doing good for the kingdom. The Phoenix Queen is about to awaken in her mountaintop palace, which you can rotate to gain special benefits from the nearby lands. Seize the moment and do your best to obtain her favor!

In Ryozen the contention is always at a high pace with both direct and indirect interaction between players. The board, flippable for a two player setup, is divided into sectors that provide different sets of possible actions, but only for a limited number of available placements.

Secure the best places for your kin to gather or manage resources, recruit more allies with asymmetrical abilities, influence the tie-breaker and collect cards to improve your strategy. The turn flow runs smoothly from the very beginning, with immediate placement effects during the day phase and global effects resolved sector by sector during the night.

Never lose sight of your rivals and strive for the highest prestige!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Embers of the Imperium
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

In the years following the rise of the Mahact, the Galactic Council was forced to make some effort to defend against this, and other, pangalactic threats...
...
Adventure amongst the shards of a broken Empire!
...
This book explores the Twilight Imperium setting as established in Twilight Imperium: Fourth Edition – Prophecy of Kings. It provides a canonical, in-depth look at the setting in the way that only a roleplaying game can do. Fans of Genesys, fans of Twilight Imperium, and fans of thrilling and heroic adventures in a sprawling and rich space opera setting should all love this book.

boardgame.name: Final Girl: Paula Promo
boardgame.description:
Play Paula in any Final Girl Scenario!
Anytime you would roll only 1 die, roll 2 instead. If a single number result is needed, you choose which die to use.

*** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q4 2022*** Contents: Kickstarter Edition of Final Girl: Paula Promo Card Board Game Expansion by Van Ryder Games. Includes one promo card. Requires Final Girl: Core Game to play (sold separately). Please note: unless otherwise stated paid add ons from the Kickstarter Campaign are not included.

boardgame.name: Die Olsenbande: Das Spiel
boardgame.description:
The players have to reach the safe (Franz Jäger Berlin) in the center of the game board. To do this they need certain objects, that are provided by the green cards. The card "geheime Zonenzahl" will be needed by every player. The players move on the board from the edge to the center by playing the matching object card to enter a space. Movement is one space in any direction, orthogonal or diagonal adjacent. If the player has no suitable card, he may roll a die and exchange cards according to the result of the roll, instead of moving his piece.

After their move the players draw a red adversary card and all players have to follow the instructions according to the shown adversary, if applicable according to the colored frame of space they are standing in.

The first player to reach the safe and has a "geheime Zonenzahl" card wins the game.

—user summary

listing.notes: Will only ship to Germany and EU. Bank transfer is possible. Shipping costs only in Germany included.

boardgame.name: Pass the Bomb: Family
Tick… Tack… Bumm: Family
boardgame.description:
In this fast-paced game, players must solve a word or dexterity challenge before the bomb explodes! In addition to word challenges similar to the classic 'Pass the Bomb' game, this Family edition for 3 to 8 players adds simple skill/dexterity challenges like catching a ball in a cup or quickly 'building' a worm out of puzzle pieces. The word challenge categories are 'Word Acrobat', 'Rhyming Artist', and 'Typical' (thematically-related words). The 'bomb' is an electronic ticking timer that can 'explode' with no warning during the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim – The Adventure Game: Miniatures Set

boardgame.name: Connect the Bay
boardgame.description:
Compete with other players to create seamless connections across the San Francisco Bay Area, and build a dream transit system for the Bay Area.

In 30-60 minutes of game play, 2-5 players compete to create an integrated transit network to help Bay Area residents and visitors travel seamlessly around the region.

Strategically place your homes, jobs and activity centers to create a more Seamless Bay Area. Multiply your impact by cutting transfer delays and installing dedicated bus lanes. The player who builds the most connections wins!

Initially setup with the current situation of city and transit delays, then use dice to pick where to put housing. Each turn the player has ways to remove transfer delays or to place more homes, jobs, or activities. Score is based on how closely connected those homes, jobs, and activities are, not just to one player's set.

boardgame.name: Unlock!: Game Adventures
boardgame.description:
Unlock! is a cooperative card game inspired by escape rooms that uses a simple system which allows you to search scenes, combine objects, and solve riddles. Play Unlock! to embark on great adventures, while seated at a table using only cards and a companion app that can provide clues, check codes, monitor time remaining, etc.

Unlock! Game Adventures includes three separate scenarios for you to explore, each set in a different well-known board games universe:


Mysterium: Enter the manor and experience a dark and surreal investigation in which you must resolve the murder with the Ghost's vision cards in a dreamlike and esoteric journey filled with mysteries...
Ticket to Ride: Take a train trip across the U.S. in which you must thwart the scheme planned by the Rail Barons.
Pandemic: An epidemic threatens humankind! Everyone's future depends on you and your team of medical experts (virologist, medic, dispatcher...) as you face a global health crisis.


Note: Unlock! requires a free application to be downloaded from the App Store or Google Play. Once downloaded, an internet connection is not required during game play.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Regroup!: Chicken Army
boardgame.description:
In Regroup! Chicken Army you organize your army of chicken warriors or chicken wizards to fight with the other players' armies. Only one chicken army will emerge victorious from battle!

Each turn you choose a card and place it over another card on your grid seeking a match between physical or magical attack and defense. Once all the players have placed and organized their card, the round ends and the combat begins. Each player deals or absorbs damage (physical or magical) based on the connected chickens of the same type (sword, shield, wands, barriers). The last player standing, wins!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Outer Wilds - Echoes of the Eye
boardgame.description: A strange satellite photo that can’t be explained. A new museum exhibit that marks the trailhead for one last journey into the wilds. Should you pull at the thread and unravel the solar system’s deepest secret, or is some knowledge better left in the dark?

boardgame.name: The Unwanderer
boardgame.description: A playbook for Wanderhome.

boardgame.name: The Barrows Hunger
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

In the Viridian hills, a cluster of silent mounds in the earth. They wait. Their dark mouths gape patiently, daring trespass. Ancient burial sites of some long lost order whose greatest wonders would never stand up to modern marvels. A cheap haul for a fledgling tomb robber, if anything still exists worth stealing from these humble monuments. They seem identical to a thousand other forgotten places burrowed in the earth like forgotten beetles.

They are not what they seem.

Enter a collection of bizarre crypts that commemorate a kingdom that never was. Learn the terrible secrets of these holes in the earth, and confront what lies yet further beneath. Dance upon the tongue of ancient horror.

boardgame.name: Living Jack
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

This is a new background for Troika! Numinous Edition. The background is for a pumpkin plant that has come to life.

boardgame.name: Postaw na klocka
boardgame.description:
Postaw na klocka is a board game in which players try to construct the building shown on the card as quickly as possible. Some of them are individual challenges, but most of them require you to join teams temporarily with the players indicated by the card. You should demonstrate not only dexterity here, but also good communication and perceptiveness, because the buildings must be constructed according to the pattern and color. The fastest player or team gets one point each.

When a player's pawn stands on a special field, he must draw a difficulty card. From that moment on, he must play a given grasping technique, e.g. using only his thumbs or not bending his elbow.

boardgame.name: Hidden Fête of the Krakonspiracy
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

A simple adventure for any game based on the world's oldest RPG, but especially made for Old School Essentials.

boardgame.name: Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass
boardgame.description:
Source: [ The Game Website].

Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass is a Japanese-style RPG made by a guy from Texas. It was very much influenced by SNES-era jRPGs, particularly Earthbound, Final Fantasy 5, and the Breath of Fire series, among others. It was also heavily influenced by Yume Nikki.

The game takes place in the dream of an eight-year-old boy. When an alien entity appears and threatens his family and the stability of the dream world itself, Jimmy sets out on an adventure to save his family and eradicate the threat of the Pulsating Mass. Along the way, Jimmy will have to work with his family, confront his own shortcomings, and brave the creeping nightmares of his subconscious.

Features:
-Full-length Japanese-style RPG.
-Classic turn-based combat with some modern sensibilities.
-A big emphasis on exploration.
-As an empathetic kid, Jimmy gains the ability to imagine himself as several of the monsters he meets, allowing him to interact with the world in new ways.
-These different transformations can also be leveled up, granting Jimmy higher stats and new abilities.
-A story for adults delivered from the perspective of a child.
-Jokes.
-Unspeakable horrors.

boardgame.name: Monopoly: Dungeons & Dragons
boardgame.description:
Heed the call to capture monsters from across the Forgotten Realms in MONOPOLY: Dungeons & Dragons! Buy, sell, and trade traditional and modern iconic and deadly monsters like the Beholder, Storm Giant, and infamous Demogorgon to nerf the competition. Six collectible tokens representing classes including Halfling Rogue, Human Fighter, Human Wizard, Dwarven Cleric, Elven Ranger, and Tiefling Bard take you around the board to make discoveries, build up Expeditions and Bases, and collect custom D&D currency to become the richest adventurer and win!
—description from the publisher

As an officially-branded Monopoly variety, the four corner squares are not allowed to be rethemed, but the rest of the game is D&D-themed. Gameplay works the same as classic Monopoly.

Includes game board, 6 metal tokens, 28 Title Deed Cards, 16 Encounters (Chance) Cards, 16 Treasure (Community Chest) Cards, paper money with customized art, 32 Expeditions (Houses), 12 Bases (Hotels), 2 dice, and rules.

boardgame.name: Druid Circle of Dragons
boardgame.description:
"Those who study the ways of nature know that humanoids are not the top of the food chain. They know in most places they barely come close. There are druids who acknowledge this and seek to learn from one of the greatest powers across the realms. Dragons. Creatures that are at the pinnacle of almost all food chains and the top of most legends, myths, and stories of old. Despite a dragons attraction for the arcane, or their lust for gold, these creatures are often found as steadfast defenders of the natural lands they inhabit.

The desire to understand these creatures brings druids of this circle magical abilities allowing them to adopt some features of dragonkind. These druids seek adventure in order to educate themselves and others about about the power of dragons, and using that power to defend their lands, much like a dragon, would defend its hoard.

This product gives a new subclass for druids, specifically aimed at those who wish to utilise draconic abilities, with a new take on wildshape and new abilities, designed to be fair and balanced whilst giving the player a great experience."

(Author Summary)

boardgame.name: Medical Bankruptcy: The Game
boardgame.description:
Have you ever wanted to understand why healthcare expenses are one of the leading causes of bankruptcies in the US in a fun educational way that also lets you destroy your friends? No? Well too bad, this game exists.

The goal of the game is to avoid getting the Bankruptcy cards. You have everything in your arsenal from GoFundMe campaigns, private equity buyouts, and PBMs to make sure you're the last one to go bankrupt. Discover all the insane ways the healthcare system ends up making you pay while getting distracted by the cute illustrations that describe them. Non-US citizens will not understand this game at all.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Oath: Chronicles of Empire and Exile – Laserox Organizer
boardgame.description:
In Oath: Chronicles of Empire and Exile, you’ll be travelling through – and also creating – the history of an ancient land. You’ll either take the role of the Chancellor, trying to maintain their power and being truthful to keeping their oath, or the Exiles, scheming and forming alliances to seize the leading role over the land. The game has no set script, each game will be unique as it is the players’ decisions that determine the outcome and will affect the course of the game in the following generations.

To help you keep everything in place during your adventures in Oath’s realm, we’ve made an organizer to fit the game box, neatly store all game components and help you prepare to write the next chapter of your kingdom’s history.

Features:
- Supports premium sleeved cards (tested with SWAN)
- 6 individual, engraved faction boxes
- 2-slot embellished favour and secret token tray with legs
- Engraved dice box
- Card holder with dividers – holds all the cards and the original cardboard dividers as well
- Tray for oath and relic cards, tokens, turn markers
2-storey tray for bigger sized cards (unsleeved), with the lower storey to store the cards after saving the game
- Extra tray for small cardboard elements
- Dedicated space for the playerboards and the playmat

Supports the following:
- Oath: Chronicles of Empire and Exile (2021)
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Oath: Chronicles of Empire and Exile

boardgame.name: 7 Wonders (Second Edition): Laserox Organizer
boardgame.description:
Draft your way through 3 ages to build the most prestigious city along with one of the seven wonders of the ancient world. The well-known game was redesigned in 2020 and we also redesigned our organizer to hold the new edition and its expansions. Whether you choose the path of trading with your neighbors, building your army, developing in science or culture, or a combination of all, you’ll be well assisted by our organizer that holds all the components neatly in place and quickens the game setup process.

Features:
- Supports premium sleeved cards (tested with SWAN)
- Unique money tower with 3 removable trays
- Engraved card holder with dividers
- Dedicated space for the rulebook and playerboards
- Embellished holder for diplomacy markers
- Debt marker tray
- Fleet figure tray
- Naval victory token box with lid
- 6-slot tray for Naval defeat and Military victory markers
- 2 boxes for Military defeat and Boarding tokens
- Room for 4 scorepads – 2 on top and 2 under the shallow trays
- Fits all expansions of the second edition

Supports the following:
- 7 Wonders (Second Edition) (2020)
- 7 Wonders (Second Edition): Leaders (2021)
- 7 Wonders (Second Edition): Cities (2020)
- 7 Wonders (Second Edition): Armada (2020)
- 7 Wonders: Cities – Shadow Guild Promo Card (2020)
- 7 Wonders: Architects Guild Promo Card (2020)
- 7 Wonders: Gamers Guild Promo Card (2020)
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: 7 Wonders: Cities – Shadow Guild Promo Card

boardgame.name: Count Drac's Bric-a-Brac
boardgame.description:
Count Dracula is dead, and you're in line to inherit - but who gets his prized coffins, and who gets stuck with the garlic?

Collect the best mementos for yourself in Count Drac's Bric-a-Brac, splitting and sharing Count Drac's possessions to get the best inheritance and leave the other vampires holding the garlic.

Each round, you'll draw 4 cards from the deck, containing some of Count Drac’s belongings that need to be divided up. Then, you'll split those cards into two piles between you and one of your neighbors.

They'll choose one of the piles and give the other one back to you, while you do the same thing with the opposite neighbor. Try to split the piles so that you get the cards you need while preventing your opponents from getting the stuff they want!

Your inheritance is made up of all the cards in front of you, and will grow each round. After placing all the cards you receive that turn into your inheritance, you can sacrifice a single card. Sacrificing a card removes it from your inheritance, but can win you Dracula’s Favour from beyond the grave.

The game ends after 6 rounds, shown on the Central Board in the center of the table. The player with the most Vampire Points (VPs) wins the game, ascending to the highest echelons of vampiric society!

—description from the designer
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: Inside the Box Board Games LLP (ITB)

boardgame.name: Dwergar: Promo cards
boardgame.description:
Set of 8 cards available in the English/Polish edition of Dwergar.

4 cards have simply art on them and don't have a function in the game. The other 4 are extra event cards marked 61 - 64:

61. Each player gets 3 gold
62. Each player can light up all his/her furnaces
63. Each player gets 2 stone or 1 iron
64. Each player gets one new furnaces (if available)

—user summary

listing.notes:
GERMAN version | Deutsche Version

boardgame.name: Fiesta de los Juegos
boardgame.description:
Fiesta de Los Juegos is a special edition adaptated from popular board game Fiesta de los Muertos. Instead of finding deceased celebrities, you'll have to find board game names. This very limited edition celebrates the board game industry and will be available exclusively at the french game event Festival des Jeux de Cannes 2022.

Each player chooses a word to describe their starting board game themed card. But beware, this word will pass from hand to hand, and change little by little… Indeed, each turn players will read the clue word written by their neighbour, erase it and write another word related to that clue for the next player around the table. Looking at the final words after they have been passed and altered four times and the starting cards, will everyone be able to find the right connections?

boardgame.name: Kawaii Neko Girls
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Solve the puzzles to see the cute cat girls

boardgame.name: Catan: Das Duell – Sonderkarte 2021: Weinberg
boardgame.description:
Bonus Card for "Catan - das Duell"
Text on card "Auslage: An ein Hügelland. Sie starten mit 1 Wein. Beim Ereignis Ertragreiches Jahr drehen sie den Weinberg (falls möglich) 1 Stufe höher. Drehen Sie den Weinberg beim Ereignis Fahrender Händler 1 Stufe tiefer, erhalten Sie 1 beliebigen Rohstoff. Bedingung: Kloster"

boardgame.name: Die Legenden von Andor: Magische Helden – Die Magie von Choranat
boardgame.description:
Single card expansion for Die Legenden von Andor: Magische Helden.

Die Magie von Choranat gives bonus magic to the heroes.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Die Legenden von Andor: Magische Helden

listing.notes: New & unplayed. Not in shrink (but there never was a version in shrink :-) ). Shipping to Germany/Europe. Other locations => please ask via PM before ordering. Thank you.
New & unplayed. Not in shrink (but there never was a version in shrink :-) ). Shipping to Germany/Europe. Other locations => please ask via PM before ordering. Thank you.

boardgame.name: Elegy of the Sapphire Adept
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

A plague of sapphire vines assault the city of Troika. Take a trip into the Flesh Sculptor's Abode to discover the source of this disastrous, verdant assault.

boardgame.name: Attack of the Timelord!
Gerry Anderson's Terrahawks
Senhor das Trevas!
boardgame.description:
Back of game box
An unexpected power surge plunges your time machine into the forbidden dimension of Spryus the Deathless - Timelord of Chaos! You'll hear the taunts and threats of the Timelord himself as his awesome armadas pursue you through a newly created warp in eternity! His fleet attacks in different formations every time. His Time Ships fire four different kinds of weapons - each requiring a different responce - and you face them all at once! 256 different challenge levels! Advanced digital scoring with memory for high player's name and score. Full sync sound action - plus speech if played through The Voice of Odyseey²! For one or more players
IMPORTANT! This game's electronic sound effects are enhanced by speech when played through the Voice of Odyssey² module. Only the electronic sounds will be heard if The Voice module is nor used.


User Summary

The European release is titled to be based upon the British TV-series Terrahawks.

boardgame.name: The Shaman Class for Old School RPGs
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Shamans are healers and divination casters that receive their magic from the spirit world. Their close connection to the spirit world also makes them more effective against undead then a traditional cleric. Included in this document is the following:

shaman character class
spells
magic items
potion creation rules

boardgame.name: Black Bow
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Good friends are hard to come by. They are even harder to avenge after they had been murdered by the Russian Mob. It didn't matter that Silvio and his friend were on the wrong side of the law, too. They had to pay for taking his friend. As those responsible fell under a hail of arrows, Silvio realized that his skill as an archer could get him paid better than any petty crime ever could. He would serve the underworld as an elit assassin... Arco Negro - The Black Bow!

boardgame.name: Template: Psychic Entity (3E)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Psychic Entity is a disembodied mind armed with out-of-body powers and abilities. The exact nature of a Psychic Entity can vary considerably from imaginary friends to disembodied Psion’s, mental parasites to repressed personas who have taken on a life of their own. Without a body, however, the Psychic Entity is not disadvantaged but instead liberated from the meat-and-bone cage to which others cling. With their mind free to expand and evolve, the Psychic Entity is empowered by their very existence.

boardgame.name: Cyberpunk RED Data Screen
boardgame.description:
Skip the Flip! Four Panels of Essential Data!

When your Crew’s getting down to the Meat and the Metal and waiting on your call, you don’t have time to dig through stacks of hardcopy or rely on CTRL + F to find the info you need.

That’s why you need to interface with the Cyberpunk RED Data Screen. All the information you need to run the game faster and smarter plus four panels of gorgeous art to shield your notes from prying cybereyes.

From the R. Talsorian website

boardgame.name: The Mysterious Demesne of Dom Perestrelo
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The landowner Dom Perestrelo is offering adventurers a unique opportunity: the chance to become the owners of a vast area of land. However, the conditions that come with the offer aren’t for just anyone, and the adventurers will have to defeat the treacherous Motucus, face the terrifying Phantom Cat and deal with the other supernatural perils that plague The Mysterious Demesne of Dom Perestrelo.

This is an adventure of exploration and discovery in the Royal Captaincy of Rio de Janeiro in the 16th century. This scenario can be used as a standalone adventure or as part of a campaign in progress. It is designed for 4 to 6 players and takes about 10 hours of total play time to complete.

boardgame.name: The Rich Bastard's Guide to Magick
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Spend it while you've got it.

This Mage 20th Anniversary Edition sourcebook expands on the mystique of the elite with an exploration of how the real movers and shakers operate when you throw magick into their world as well.

The Rich Bastard’s Guide to Magick contains:


An examination of money and mage society, exploring what it means to have magick and wealth at your fingertips.
Money Magic: viewing the technocratic concepts of Hypereconomics and the Primal Utility Sphere through a non-technocracy POV. Includes new money-based magickal effects.
Movers and Shakers: Organizations, private clubs, elite locations, and the sample characters you might meet in such places.
High-Ticket Items: A collection of the best talismans, instruments, devices, and wonders money can buy (or can buy you access to), plus costly enhancements for sanctums, laboratories, chantries, etc.

boardgame.name: Grim(m) World: Erste Schritte – Die Feder, der Stein und ein Frosch
Grim(m) World: First Steps – The Feather, the Stone and the Frog
boardgame.description: The Feather, the Stone and the Frog is the third mini expansion for Grim(m) World - First Steps. This expansion consists of 9 cards and includes two new rumors and a new level 1 quest, which you can add to your game.

boardgame.name: Creature Pack 1: Steel Legion Mercenaries
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A collection of 10 unique creatures for 5E including 4 Regular Troops, 3 Elite Troops, 2 Officers, and 1 Animal ranging from CR1 to CR9.

This pack contains a variety of creatures (or NPCs) designed to give you an easy mercenary army that is trained to work together and watch one another's back. What to protect your lair, castle or treasure? You can trust the Steel Legion Mercenaries with this job.

boardgame.name: Cauchemar
Nightmare
boardgame.description:
User Summary

After you entered a haunted house (why did you even do that?) the door closes behind you and the only way out is through the attic - but first you have to pass the three floors up to the attic, while avoiding the ghosts.

boardgame.name: Wormholes
boardgame.description:
In a peaceful galaxy, a new technology has been invented: wormholes. They allow ships to warp from one point to another, which opens up countless possibilities for commerce and travel. As the captain of a passenger spaceship newly equipped with a wormhole fabricator, you can make some serious space bucks by building a robust network of wormholes. Link the farthest reaches of space while delivering passengers to become the most successful captain in this golden age of spacefaring. It’s time to bend space and go fast.

In Wormholes, players collect passengers from planets, each of whom have specific destinations they aim to reach. However, this pick-up-and-deliver process can be quite different once you establish wormholes between different points of the galaxy — and like any good business, your service can be used by other players...at the cost of a few points.

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Too Many Bones: 40 Caves in Daelore
boardgame.description:
Specifically designed for Too Many Bones: Unbreakable.
Mix up your Too Many Bones: Unbreakable games with new encounters and Baddies.

40 encounter cards
15 baddie chips

boardgame.name: The Journal of Fighting Ships in Earth Subsector 3
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Incoming intelligence!

Ship captains need information about the systems to which they are traveling. These captains depend on Wendy’s Naval Weekly as their primary source of naval fleet information. It is rare to find a ship captain that doesn’t have Wendy’s Naval Weekly on their handcomps or mindcomps.

Wendy’s Guide to the Fleets of Earth Sector Volume 3 is the third entry of a series which will collate all the available information to provide a complete overview of the fleets of the nations of Earth Sector. Each of these books will briefly outline a nation’s spacegoing navy as well as provide some insight as to how that organization functions and provide a list of the ships reported to be in commission.

This book provides information on the space navies of the Antiochian Union, Indonesia, Israel, Korea, Mexico, New Zealand, and the Seleucid Confederation. The book covers every ship currently operated in those fleets, their doctrines, and even their uniforms. The book also contains an in-depth discussion of the Nahash-class system defense boat, one of the many classes of ship used by the Space Navy of Israel.

boardgame.name: Cast Iron Chef
boardgame.description:
The City has an annual festival where many courageous adventuring parties compete in various events. This year, there is an exciting new game in the arena - the Cast Iron Chef competition. In this contest two teams of four will compete to serve one hundred guests selected from the people in the stands.

You and your party of bold and intrepid adventurers have decided that you want to be part of the Cast Iron Chef winning team! With your weapons and armour strapped on and at the ready, you step into the arena waiting for the key words - Allez Cuisine!

boardgame.name: Let Us In
boardgame.description:
It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a young student in want of a good inheritance, must visit their rich relatives for the harvest festival.

But who is being harvested this year?

A new 16-page one-shot system neutral horror adventure for four heroes from the author of Witchburner and Longwinter. Perfect for your pumpkin spice latte season.

- Description from Exalted Funeral

boardgame.name: Dragons, Delve-Ins, and Dives
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dragon's, Delve-In, and Dives provides 15 unique dragon lairs as quirky as Guy Fieri himself. Whether it's a rigged casino, a kaiju skull, a hilltop fayre full of games, or inside the dragon itself, these lairs put an innovative and engaging twist on typical dragon encounters. No longer does a dragon's lair have to be a smash and grab or the long crawl. Now you can outwit, outlast, or our play any dragon you don't want to befriend.

Each of these 15 encounters includes a map, unique loot, adventure hooks, and more!

The 15 lairs include:


1 lair for each chromatic and metalic dragon (10 total)
1 "Necrowyrm" lair
1 "Nightmare Dragon" lair
1 Psuedodragon lair
2 Lairs that can be used by any dragon

boardgame.name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Warriors of Kerensky I
boardgame.description: This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Clans. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Clan Invasion Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, callsign, and quote was also based on details submitted by Clan Invasion Kickstarter backers.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Sen: Ujawnijcie 1 Dodatkowa karta
boardgame.description:
A set of three promo cards for the game "Sen". Ujawnijcie (Reveal)

3 cards with the same image and text: Ujawnijcie 1 with a value of 5

The player that uses the card can use it as a normal card or use its special action: the player reveals 1 card from his/her dream, all other players reveal a card lying in the same place in their dream, then the revealed cards are turned down.

boardgame.name: Longwinter: Referee's Book
boardgame.description:
Dooms and devastations to visit upon a cosy roleplaying setting.

Longwinter is the RPG sandbox of a realm that has broken its vows to Winterwhite and will now pay the cold price.

This book contains secret knowledge and mechanics for the referee.

The setting is profoundly close to that of Witchburner (by the same author and artist).

boardgame.name: Longwinter: Visitor's Book
boardgame.description:
A cosy roleplaying setting of high mountains and deep problems.

Longwinter is the two-book RPG sandbox of a mountainous winter country on the cusp between the old and the new, the edge of modernity, the stepping stone of a new age. New mines and industries are opened, light breaks the gloom of ancient ruins, change comes to sweep away the cobwebs of history. But cobwebs do not go easily into the dust.

This winter will be memorable.

This book contains common knowledge and mechanics for all the players: heroes and referees. Longwinter: The Referee’s Book contains tools for running Longwinter at the table. The idea behind splitting Longwinter into two books is to make it easier for the players to share the world, while preserving the challenges and random events for the referee alone.

The setting is profoundly close to that of Witchburner (by the same author and artist).

- Description from Exalted Funeral

boardgame.name: Boat Canasta
boardgame.description:
Boat Canasta is the fast-moving card game where teams score points by melding cards (combining at least 3 or more cards of the same rank). The goal of the game is for each team to create at least one Canasta, or meld of seven cards, in each round. Teams work in unison, and their luck can change depending on how the cards fall. Point values are printed directly on the cards for easy scoring.

To score the most points by creating Melds, Canastas and earning bonuses. The first team to reach 10,000 points wins the game. If both teams reach a score of 10,000 points in the same round, then the team with the most points wins. For a shorter game, players can agree on a lower point total before play begins, say 5,000 points.

boardgame.name: The Captain Is Dead: The Problem with Priggles
boardgame.description:
Nobody knows what Priggles are or where they came from. What is known is that they don’t like the aliens. Or maybe it’s the aliens that don’t like them? Either way, who cares? The important thing is that they can be used against the aliens, and that makes them really handy. Unfortunately, they’re clingy little things, and once they get their cute little hooks in you, it can be really hard to shake them off...

This microexpansion for The Captain is Dead adds Priggles! Shuffle these little critters into the skill deck. You may draw one, and you can't get rid of it. But when you have three of them, you can discard all three to get rid of aliens on the ship!

boardgame.name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Card Pack I
MechWarrior Pilots II
boardgame.description:
Pack contains 9 double-sided MechWarrior pilot Cards, for a total of 18 named MechWarriors.

• Yurika Suzume/Mackenzie Cross
• Robert Otek/Tracy Maxwell Kent
• Scotty Rosek/Sawako Maki
• Garrett Cedeno/Cole
• Odilon Rodriguez/Jorma Mercer
• Jillian Snuka/Audrey
• Jevanrod Ward/Rauf Icaza
• Trent Leroux/Geertruida
• Reshondra Descatris/Vaiana

A Clan Invasion Kickstarter exclusive, Card Pack I was known as MechWarrior Pilots II during the crowdfunding campaign.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Card Pack II
MechWarrior Pilots III
boardgame.description:
Pack contains 9 double-sided MechWarrior pilot Cards, for a total of 18 named MechWarriors.

• Maconaquea Akerlund/Okubo Henderson
• Dieter Shackle/David Kendal
• Zaïre Danielson/Zhong Shui
• Maxim Vasiliev/Arthur Rutherford
• Vyna/Garo
• Hela/Magnus
• Stephania/Elvin
• Ivan/Bestla
• Polina Vickers/Eluris

A Clan Invasion Kickstarter exclusive, Card Pack II was known as MechWarrior Pilots III during the crowdfunding campaign.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Devil Bunny versus the Entire Galaxy
boardgame.description:
You are intrepid actuaries collecting butterflies of a specific color at a circus. Devil Bunny loves butterflies, and whenever he sees a big enough stack of them, he jumps on that stack, scattering them everywhere. Who will be the first to save enough butterflies, before Devil Bunny destroys the Galaxy?

Each player chooses a color of butterflies to catch. Now you roll the dice. 1-5 and you’re in the clear. You can add more butterflies to the map, or guide the ones already there back to your circus tent. The color of the top token of each stack determines who guides the rest on the path back, and you can only move as far as there are tokens in the stack. But be careful! Roll a 6 and Devil Bunny hops on your stack and scatters your butterflies to the winds! First to collect three wins!

boardgame.name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Champions of the Inner Sphere I
boardgame.description: This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Inner Sphere. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, nickname and quote was also based on detail submitted by Kickstarter backers.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Mercenaries of the Inner Sphere II
boardgame.description: This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Inner Sphere. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, nickname and quote was also based on detail submitted by Kickstarter backers.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: BattleTech: MechWarrior Pilot Deck – Heroes of the Clan Invasion
Mechwarrior Pilot Deck: Battle of Tukayyid
boardgame.description:
This deck consists of 55 Pilot Cards detailing characters from across the Inner Sphere. One side of the each card has the standard Pilot Card entry; the other side depicts a character illustration commissioned for one of the Kickstarter backers. Each pilot's name, nickname and quote was also based on detail submitted by Kickstarter backers.

This deck was originally listed as Mechwarrior Pilot Deck: Battle of Tukayyid during the crowdfunding campaign.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: Ура, это гриб! (Hooray! It's a mushroom!)
boardgame.description:
In Ура, это гриб! ("Hooray! It's a mushroom!") players find themselves in a magical forest and, like real mushroom pickers, try to find as good mushrooms as possible.

On your turn, you may take any visible card. It is at this moment that you need to be as careful as possible, because you can often understand from the card back which mushroom or plant is hiding on the back. It can be a valuable mushroom or berry or a poisonous mushroom can be caught, which will take away victory points from you at the end of the game, or it can be nothing at all.

Once all the cards have been picked up, points are totalled and the player with the most points wins.


Настольная игра Ура, это гриб! – это игра на внимательность для самых маленьких игроков (впрочем, это не значит, что взрослым будет скучно или неинтересно). В ней игроки попадают в волшебный лес и, как настоящие грибники, пытаются найти как можно хороших грибов.Подготовить «Ура, это гриб!» к игре очень просто: нужно разложить карты рубашкой вверх посреди стола. Как именно они лежат не важно – в лесу тоже ничего не бывает аккуратно, а горка карт в этой игре и правда выглядит как лесная поляна.

В свой ход в настольной игре «Ура, это гриб!» игрок может взять любую видимую карту. Именно в этот момент нужно быть максимально внимательным, ведь по рубашке часто можно понять, какой гриб или растение скрывается на обороте. Это может быть ценный гриб или ягода, может попасться ядовитый гриб, который отнимет у вас победные очки в конце игры, а может и вовсе ничего не попасться.

Настольная игра «Ура, это гриб!» – это простая и увлекательная игра, которая помогает развивать внимательность и мелкую моторику. Правила объясняются всего за минуту, а сыграть в неё можно везде – лишь бы хватило места разложить карты.

boardgame.name: The Forgotten Road
boardgame.description:
One of the heroes in your party has been taken captive in a dungeon far beyond the edge of the wild. Now, you’ll have to travel down the forgotten road and traverse dangerous and unforgiving territory to get them back.

The Forgotten Road is a hand-management game in which you need to play your action cards and use your special abilities as efficiently as possible to take out monsters, pass skill checks, move to new locations, and defeat bosses of ever-increasing difficulty. The game ends when either you run out of action cards or health and lose — or you defeat the final boss at the end of the road/dungeon deck and win.

boardgame.name: The Last Stronghold
boardgame.description:
The forces of darkness have pushed all the way south, destroying everything in their path. The city of Lux is all that stands in their way from completely overtaking the realm. A small group of heroes must work together to fend off the evil army long enough to take out its leader.

The Last Stronghold is a dice-driven siege game in which you must fend off monsters in the areas surrounding Lux and prevent them from overtaking the city. You use special abilities and magical artifacts to manipulate the dice and monsters, with the goal of eventually taking out the final boss...should you last long enough. On your turn, you add threats to the board, decide which threats you want to deal with, move to that location, roll dice and use hero abilities to get rid of those threats, and repeat until you either defeat the final boss OR all heroes are incapacitated OR the main city you're protecting takes too much damage.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Battletech: Technical Readout – Golden Century
boardgame.description:
While the Great Houses of the Inner Sphere decimated each other over the shattered remains of the Star League and slid into the technological dark age of the Succession Wars, the Clans of Kerensky entered into a golden era of prosperity. Bereft of Nicholas Kerensky’s leadership, the Clans pushed their technological capabilities to their limits, developing devastating new weapons and technologies and flooding the battlefields of the Pentagon and Kerensky Cluster with powerful war machines as they trialed each other for supremacy.

Technical Readout: Golden Century unveils the weapons and technologies developed during a pivotal era in Clan history, when the Clans came of age and matured into what they are today. Technical Readout: Golden Century debuts the production and custom machines used by the Children of Kerensky in the early twenty-ninth and thirtieth centuries. Statistics and Record Sheets are included for 29 new advanced and experimental BattleMechs, OmniMechs, vehicles, aerospace, battle armor and WarShip units ready for play. In addition, a complete section covers the experimental designs introduced by the nascent Clans immediately following the Pentagon campaign.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: BattleTech: A Game of Armored Combat

boardgame.name: King Saul
boardgame.description:
King Saul is a 2-5 player diplomatic-economic-wargame wherein battles, cards, cities, diplomacy & harvests are all important keys to victory.

In King Saul: Will Saul defeat the Ammonites and be annointed King at Gilgal? Will Saul listen to Samuel, and be able to pass the Kingdom onto Jonathan? Once again, will Saul kill his thousands, and David his thousands upon thousands? What role will Doeg the Edomite play? Who will marry Saul’s daughter Michal? What will be the fate of Ahimelech, Ishbaal, and the Priests of Nob?

As the Ammonite King Nahash will you gouge out the eye of Israelite at Jabesh-Gilead? Will disunity in the Israeli command structure result in a weakened Israel? If Saul hunts after David, will that then be your choice time to attack? Will Saul be vexed by an evil spirit, and consult the witch at Endor? Will the Amelekites once again be victorious at the battle of Mount Gilboa?

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: No Strings Attached
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

‘Every day I stay alive, you get one gold crown. No strings attached.’
– Ernst Blücher, Cobbler

The last surviving member of Ubersreik’s Cobblers’ Guild has a simple request: Figure out who is doing away with the town’s cobblers, and put an end to them before they put an end to Ernst Blücher. Three lie dead already, and it is only a matter of time before whoever is responsible finishes what they started. Is it the work of a jealous rival, a simple coincidence, or an attempted takeover by Deisdorf’s notoriously militant Cobblers’ Guild? The Players have much to untangle while they wait for the other shoe to drop…

No Strings Attached takes place in the town of Ubersreik, the setting for the WFRP Starter Set and Ubersreik Adventures I and II. Characters will flex their investigative muscle to uncover the secrets of the murders before their patron falls foul of the same villain. No Strings Attached is suitable for 1–2 sessions of play and works equally well as part of an ongoing campaign or as a standalone adventure.

boardgame.name: Float: From the Deep
boardgame.description:
FLOAT: From the Deep is a fast-paced tabletop game where players find themselves lost at sea, battling monsters from below and attempting to outsmart and outlast their fellow survivors. With only 7 days to make it to the island in the foggy distance, it’s sink, swim, or be devoured by the next creature from the deep.

Players draw and play cards, roll dice for battling, and manage their resources and crew through their player stations. The game ends when either all members but one have been eliminated, or once all surviving parties make it to the island. They have 7 days (21 rounds) to clear and make it to the island or become shark bait.

Players win by surviving the terrors from the deep and making it safely to the island.

boardgame.name: Too Many Bones: Undertow – Control ‘Ur Roll Dice Tray
boardgame.description: Never risk rolling your dice onto the board or off the table again! A must have for any dice game, this compact dice tray folds flat to easily fit in most game boxes. Snap it into shape in seconds and you’re ready to roll. Rounded edges even protect against crooked rolls! This 9" x 10" tray is edge-stitched and printed with the Undertow logo on the back, and a Sibron River pattern on the front.

boardgame.name: Lords of Ragnarok: Seas of Aegir
boardgame.description:
The Aegir monument introduces Snekkar ships. Each player will receive four such boats and will be able to put them on the board in the spot with their Drakkar and then move them on the same rules as their Drakkar (dividing the movement between their Snekkar and/or their Drakkar). The Aegir monument replaces either Thor or Odin from the base game, and Nagflar will replace Loki as an alternate boss.

Contents:
- Aegir monument with associated help and artifact cards
- 20 Snekkar ship models
- Nagflar monster model with monster card

- description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Mayfield
boardgame.description:
"...a community world building zine for a cause."

User summary
Mayfield is a user-sourced zine full of worldbuilding ideas, compatible with Mausritter RPG. Collaborators from the Mausritter Discord donated their creations, which were then assembled by 'ManaRampMatt' - with proceeds from the PDF & print runs donated to support Suicide Prevention & Crisis hotline.

boardgame.name: Wonders of the World
boardgame.description:
Take a trip around the world and get to know some of the most amazing and unique sights on the planet! On your turn, try to recognize famous wonders and place them on the right continents. If you don’t guess correctly, the clues will help you find the right answer!

This Fact-Packed educational game tests your knowledge and takes you on a trip. Name the manmade and natural wonders on each card. Then guess their location or purpose to win the cards and score points. The player with the most points wins.

Contains 195 wonders from all corners of the world, and a map marked with their locations

boardgame.name: Unmatched: Battle of Legends, Volume One – Foil Cards
boardgame.description: A pack of four foil cards, two of which have been distributed separately before: Sinbad, Medusa, King Arthur, Alice.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Unmatched: Battle of Legends, Volume One

boardgame.name: Unmatched: Robin Hood vs. Bigfoot – Foil Cards
boardgame.description: Two foil cards.

boardgame.name: Unmatched: Little Red Riding Hood vs. Beowulf – Foil cards
boardgame.description: Two foil cards: Little Red and Beowulf.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Unmatched: Little Red Riding Hood vs. Beowulf

boardgame.name: Normon Cards
boardgame.description:
A Card Game for the Normal Mormon This is essentially a edgy Mormon version of Cards against Humanity. Or in a more Mormon speaking way, a edgy version of Apples to Apples.

Draw a tan card, everybody picks one black card from their hand and you pick the best answer. First to 5 points wins.

Roll a die at the beginning of your turn, if you roll a 6, draw a card and preform it's action. you can also try to inflict a Lucifer card on another player.

boardgame.name: Renaissance Wars: Radiant Luminaries Set
boardgame.description:
This is a set of two additional Luminaries, Leonardo da Vinci and Johannes Gutenberg. Each Luminary comes with its own player mat, card, and portrait token. They may be integrated into the base game without modification to the rules.

This set was only available by pledging at the Renaissance pledge level or higher during the kickstarter.

boardgame.name: Mixtape Massacre: Myth Expansion
boardgame.description:
An expansion for both Mixtape Massacre and Mixtape Massacre: Escape From Tall Oaks.

When Mr. Beckman and his friends went out for the annual Tall Oaks Hunt, they never came back. Two days later, a search party found him in the woods, covered in the blood of his friends, rambling about a myth from Tall Oaks lore. He quickly became the prime suspect. Now Kimmy and friends must work together to prove the existence of the Myth and save her father.

To dispel gossip and rumors, the Mayor called in esteemed big game hunter, Duke Morrison. Morrison was given two directives: prove or disprove the Myths’s existence and rid Tall Oaks of their slasher problem once and for all. He gladly accepted.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Mixtape Massacre: Escape From Tall Oaks

boardgame.name: Mixtape Massacre (Director's Cut)
boardgame.description:
More Game. More Gore.
6 years ago, players took a chance visit to the small town of Tall Oaks… and Mixtape Massacre was born.

Mixtape Massacre is a tabletop board game where 2 to 6 players terrorize the town and compete in an over-the-top fictional killing spree to be remembered. Dripping with nostalgic 1980’s pop-culture and classic horror tropes – Mixtape Massacre will have you laughing while you’re slashing! Dispatch victims, collect kills and brawl with fellow slashers to prove once and for all who is the baddest of the brood!

Even better, this brand new Director’s Cut edition boasts updated rules and components, improved mechanics, and even more killer additions to create the ultimate version of the game.

Welcome to the next chapter of Tall Oaks — Mixtape Massacre: Director’s Cut.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Mixtape Massacre (Director's Cut): Slasher's Mini Pack
boardgame.boardgameintegration: Mixtape Massacre: Escape From Tall Oaks
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Mixtape Massacre: Snack Attack Killer Pack
Mixtape Massacre: The Black Masque Expansion
Mixtape Massacre: The Scare Booster Pack
Mixtape Massacre: The Sleigher Booster Pack
boardgame.boardgameintegration: Mixtape Massacre: Escape From Tall Oaks

boardgame.name: Space Rocket
boardgame.description:
In Space Rocket, you are all part of a company that is looking for a way out of space and close to the Moon. Growing fuel, generating fuel, capacity and training.

Includes 3 game modes: cooperative, solitary and competitive.

The game box is placed upside-down in the center of the tab. le and on it, the Take-Off card and the Space Rocket. Players start with 10 Fuel tokens. Shuffle all the folded cards (Light Blue Sky, Blue Sky and Outer Space). Also shuffle the 10 Grey Cloud cards with the Moon card below them.

Each turn, players must use a Fuel token, place 2 folded cards vertically without touching the rocket and then a Grey Clouds card above them. Finally, they must take the Space Rocket and put it above the card. If it touches a resource, take it. If it touches an Acceleration arrow, repeat your turn.

The objective of the game is to reach the Moon with 5 or more coins left.
Players lose if the tower of cards fall off or they run out of fuel.

For competitive play, the winner is the one with most coins when the last card is played or the cards fall (who makes it fall loses all their coins).

boardgame.name: Mixtape Massacre: Hallow's Eve expansion
boardgame.description:
This expansion take the Scare character and gives it more than just a character and a couple cards.

The Scare booster is a playable character in Mixtape Massacre. In the Hallow's Eve expansion The Scare serves as the main adversary. And as you can tell by the picture above.

boardgame.name: Mixtape Massacre: Snack Attack Killer Pack
boardgame.description: Adds 3 new characters to the game. Delicious movie snacks have turned into killing fiends. The Kernal, Frank and Bubbles are on the rampage!

boardgame.name: Mixtape Massacre (Director's Cut): Slasher's Mini Pack
boardgame.description: Miniatures of the original 10 slasher characters. These can replace the standees from the first edition.

boardgame.name: Mixtape Massacre (Director's Cut): Updated Profile cards
boardgame.description: updated profile cards for all existing first edition Booster Packs and Expansions that makes them compatible with Director's Cut (second ed.)
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Mixtape Massacre: Bad Dad Booster Pack
Mixtape Massacre: The Black Masque Expansion
Mixtape Massacre: The Scare Booster Pack
Mixtape Massacre: The Sleigher Booster Pack

boardgame.name: Kingyo
boardgame.description:
In Kingyo, you have to catch as many Kingyo (goldfishes) as possible, matching the colors of the dice.

The Kingyo cards are laid out around the 5 dice. Players can divide themselves into teams as they wish. Each player takes a Bowl card to place the Kingyo cards they will catch.

One player rolls the 5 dice, then all players simultaneously try to catch the cards with Kingyo that match the colors of the dice, announcing the colors of the Kingyo caught.

Some cards have bonuses in addition to the Kingyo:
If you catch a Dragonfly, roll all 5 dice again.
If you catch a Hornet, each opponent must discard a card from their bowl.
If you catch a Scoop, you can immediately take any card.

When you think it's no longer possible to catch Kingyo cards with colors that match the dice, catch one of the special "Medaka" cards. The game is over for you, but other players can continue to catch cards if they find any. Be careful because there is one less Medaka card than the number of players...

At the end of the game, players score 1 point for each Kingyo and 4 points for the Medaka card in their bowl. In a team game, only the team's bowl with the lowest score will count.

- description from designers

boardgame.name: Voyages
boardgame.description:
Voyages is a roll-and-write game of open sea adventure and exploration. Each player is the captain of a vessel sailing the seas and requires a single printed game sheet and pencil, while one player also needs to provide three dice.

On a turn, three dice are rolled for all the players. Each player chooses one die for the direction they are sailing, another for how far they sail, and the final die for crew duties aboard their ship. Players score points for visiting different islands, gathering and selling goods for trade, and training their sailors in case they come across the mysterious Dread...

Playable from 1-100+ players, either locally or virtually, Voyages will be supported over time with new expansion content provided for free to original backers of the game.
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 37: Roland Wright (a slew of Roll & Write games)
Episode 167: Voyages, Anno 1800, Mini Express, Nyet!

boardgame.name: Haunted: A Single Player Journaling Game
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

You moved to the city to get a fresh start after your relationship ended. It’s cold and lonely here, and you’re left with nothing but time to reflect on exactly where and why things changed. Maybe you realized a lot of the problems were yours. Maybe it’s clear you stuck around way past your due date, clinging to a relationship that was only held together by wishes and stubborn denial. What happened to the two of you?
boardgame.rpg: Haunted: A Single Player Journaling Game

boardgame.name: In the Light of a Setting Sun: Saddlebag Edition
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

In the Light of a Setting Sun: Saddlebag Edition is a compilation and expansion of the three original pamphlets released in the summer of 2019. Though a complete system within itself, the three original pamphlets were rudimentary and left a lot to be interpreted by the game’s judge. Saddlebag Edition seeks to expand upon certain mechanics - while introducing others - in order to make the judge’s role that much easier.
boardgame.rpg: In the Light of a Setting Sun

boardgame.name: Into the Fae Woods
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Into the Fae Woods is a solo journaling game about wandering in the woods and finding a companion along the way.

boardgame.name: // REDACTED //
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

// REDACTED // ​is a single-player RPG about an AGENT on a deadly MISSION. They’ll get what they want and damn the consequences. After all, consequences don’t matter if you’re dead

boardgame.name: Stuck and Wretched
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

In Stuck and Wretched you play the role of an explorer that decided to trek through a mountain section or a canyon. Due to a stroke of bad luck, you fell 1.000 feet (300 meters) through a crevasse. A rock smashes your unskilled hand leaving you stuck with no way out. Your cellphone fell 15 feet in front of you (5 meters), out of reach and with its glass completely smashed from what you see.

You are alone, with nothing else in your backpack that those things you may have grabbed for a day of exploring. Your resources are low, and even worse, you are in a location with no signal.

You came here on your own, without letting anyone know for a weekend trek. You are in the middle of nowhere, only accompanied by the wind and some critters.

Now it’s your time to fight against yourself in a battle for survival. Can you stay conscious and stable until someone comes to rescue you? Or will you try to get out on your own?

What you seek for is close to impossible, but you have to try.

boardgame.name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar (Third Edition): Order Battletome – Stormcast Eternals
boardgame.description:
Stormcast Eternals are the mightiest warriors of Order. Each forged in Azyr by Sigmar's hand, these noble warriors strike out into the realms to do battle. Riding coruscating thunderbolts, they arrive on the field of war with an ear-splitting thunderclap. The forces of the Stormcast Eternals are the mighty hammer that crushes the forces of Chaos and the shield that protects the helpless citizens of the realms from the myriad encroaching evils. Armed with weapons blessed with celestial energy, these immortal demigods' fury and faith knows no bounds.

In this book, you'll discover how the Stormcast Eternals, mortal heroes chosen by the God-King to be Reforged into his foremost warriors, fought to bring hope to the war-ravaged Mortal Realms. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals is also packed with all the rules you need to create your own force of Order, from the Stormcasts' finest champions to the ancient draconic lords.

This 184-page hardback book contains:


A wealth of lore about the Stormcast Eternals covering everything from the Realmgate Wars to the Era of the Beast and the Dawnbringer Crusades, complete with stunning illustrations
Background information on every Stormhost and unit available to the Stormcast Eternals
A showcase of expertly painted Citadel miniatures and an in-depth painting guide covering a variety of Stormhosts
76 warscrolls covering every Stormcast Eternals unit, including three faction-specific endless spells
Rules for both Scions of the Storm and Stormkeep armies, as well battle traits, spell lores, mount traits, and holy commands
Brand new Path to Glory rules, including rules for Reforging, bespoke Stormcast Eternals territories, four quests, two battle plans, 15 warscroll battalions, and more
Pitched battle profiles with points for matched play games
And more!


—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Order Battletome – Stormcast Eternals

boardgame.name: Balão Travesso!
Le Ballon Fou
Loony Balloon
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Travel across a playground with a balloon in your hand: You can only leave the playground when you have 50 points. To get points you need to protect your balloon from birds, wind and impact as well as play various games on the playground or catch the balloon again.

boardgame.name: Buraco Negro!
Neutron Star
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Protect a cluster of satellites from being hit by planet debris after an explosion. Pick up the debris and drop them off at the neutron star in the left side of the screen without being drawn into it yourself!

boardgame.name: Antares Kingdoms
boardgame.description:
Antares Kingdoms is an euro-style kingdom builder card game set in a medieval fantasy world. Players each represent one of twelve factions vying for the claim of Serpens’ Champion, a title awarded to the kingdom deemed greatest by an elusive dynasty with great influence.

The game develops over three decades of opportunities, warfare and harvest. Each year players perform two actions to Build, Draw, Rank up and Foresee Future, and can use gold to Expedite and buy Dominions to better navigate the unknown yearly events.

Players strive to construct buildings and units relating to the six facets of their kingdom (Common Goods, Township, Resources, Military, Special and Wealth), earning achievements for progression in each. When a decade concludes, progress is carried over into the next as the board resets.

By the end of the third decade, players engage in comparing their achievements in the end game challenge. Here, outsmarting your opponent can be exercised with Dominion cards - which boost achievements secretly - keeping other players guessing whether they will win in a category or not.

After comparing all achievements earned throughout the game and Dominions at the end, the player with the most victory points (or Truemark Points) wins the title of Serpens' Champion!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Helicopter Rescue
Hélicoptère
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Control a helicopter to rescue downed pilots in a combat zone.

boardgame.name: Trans American Rally
US Rallye
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Race across USA with the amount of fuel available: The rally has three stages which all differ in difficulty. Hitting traffic will cost you precious fuel.

This game will not run on the regular Philips VideoPac G7000 (Odyssey²), but only on the enhanced VideoPac+ G7400 (which was to be released in US as Odyssey3).

boardgame.name: I.G.A.T Special Forces
boardgame.description:
I.G.A.T is a modern tactical military tabletop solo (or cooperative) game.

The player select 5 soldiers with equipment, weapons, secondary weapons, accessories, helmet etc....
After this he can go on operations for help local police in Austria for town operation, kidnapping, bank attack etc...

The game has no phase, player make an action and IA make reaction. In the buildings the player need to discover contact point. The contact point become situation, enemy, civilian and others many events (dogs attack, electricity cut...)

The player must take care of alert, if alert is high, situation become more dangerous.

Campaign system for wounds, levelling items and high customise weapons.

Like in the video game swat4, you need to score points for win the mission and gain xp for levelling soldiers.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Photo Graph
boardgame.description: Photo Graph is a cooperative game in which players have to correctly identify a picture among 5 others. To do so, the active player gives an intensity to concepts received by their partners. With each new word added, the players rule one picture out. Watch out, what is obvious for you might be puzzling for the others!

boardgame.name: Dino Dino
boardgame.description:
In Dino Dino you are a dinosaur caretaker. Build your own park, collect food and place as many dinosaurs as possible in an ever expanding world! Does your collection ultimately score the most?

Dino Dino is played over several rounds in which each player takes separate turns. During a turn, the player can choose one of the following 2 actions.

Action 1: Place Land Tile
Action 2: Place Dino

Action 1 will be performed the most. During this action, the player takes 1 of the face up land tiles. This is then placed on its existing land. This way, your own park will expand in size. As soon as you place the tile you get food. There are 3 types of food: plants, fish and meat. When the same food icons touch each other you create a chain. This way you get extra food.

If a player has enough food, action 2 can be performed. Every dinosaur has some kind of food that they want to eat, you need a certain amount of this food to be able to place them in your park. The dinosaurs give you points for a certain food type at the end of the game. This depends on the number of food icons surrounding the dinosaur in the park.

The game is over when all the land tiles have been placed. The player with the highest score wins the game.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Cults of Cthulhu
boardgame.description:
From the back cover:

CTHULHU CALLS

At long last, the intricacies of the Cthulhu Cult are revealed!
     Cults of Cthulhu guides you in the creation of complex and believable antagonists for your scenarios and campaigns—villains who are more than just faceless minions and who embody the most terrifying threat of the Cthulhu Mythos.
     Inside, you’ll find:


A history of Cthulhu cults, from the Victorian era to the Modern-Day.
Five Cthulhu cults, ready to be incorporated into your games.
Detailed guidance on designing cults and their leaders, including a special “Cults Worksheet”
Profiles for a range of cultists, new monsters, new artifacts, and new spells.
Three scenarios concerning Cthulhu cults, spanning Gaslight Victorian, Modern-Day, and the signature 1920s setting.


Cults of Cthulhu delves into the human side of the dark and horrific world of those who worship the dead yet dreaming abomination known as Great Cthulhu.

FOR MATURE READERS
This book deals with mature themes and is intended for mature players.

boardgame.name: Der Herr der Ringe: Das Kartenspiel – Geheimnisse des Düsterwalds
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Dark of Mirkwood
Le Seigneur des Anneaux Le Jeu de Cartes: Les Ténèbres de la Forêt Noire
El Señor de los Anillos: El Juego de Cartas – Las Penumbras del Bosque Negro
Il Signore degli Anelli: Il Gioco di Carte – Le Tenebre di Bosco Atro
魔戒卡牌游戏 黑森林之黯 冒险包
boardgame.description:
Your Fellowship of heroes have narrowly escaped from their ordeal in Dol Guldur. After a brief stay in Lórien, your party is on its way back to Thranduil when they see smoke billowing up from the eaves of Mirkwood. The black plumes lead you to the smoldering remains of a Woodman village, with bodies strewn about and black-feathered arrows sticking from their backs. This is clearly the work of Goblins, and the pained gasps of a dying Woodman tells you that the survivors were taken by the fiends to their lair within the forest. You swear an oath to rescue them if you can, or avenge them if you cannot, and so you draw your weapons and follow the trail into the woods.

This standalone scenario pack contains two adventures: The Oath and The Caves of Nibin-dûm. These scenarios were originally released as part of the Limited Collector’s Edition for The Lord of the Rings LCG. Now, with the inclusion of new boon and burden cards and the onset of the Revised Core Set, you and your fellow heroes can take on these two challenging scenarios as their own two-part adventure or as an extension of the core set’s Mirkwood Paths campaign. Will you track down the Goblins and rescue the captives? Or will you become lost in the dark of Mirkwood?

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: King of Monster Island

We have detected irregular movement on the Monster Island. The volcano is erupting like never before. Monsters from all around the world are gathering on the Island, what is happening? They don’t even fight each other anymore!
Because is a greater menace is lurking. Something big enough to threaten every monster and make them fight together against the same enemy…

Was this in the script? Wait… Is this a cooperative King of game?

To be continued…

—description from the publisher

—user summary

boardgame.name: Aeronautica Imperialis: Wrath of Angels
boardgame.description:
The Aeronautica Imperialis: Wrath of Angels boxed set includes everything you need to play exciting games of aerial combat between brutal Adeptus Astartes and sleek Asuryani aircraft.

The set includes the following Citadel multipart plastic miniatures, each supplied with an Aeronautica Imperialis base:

3x Adeptus Astartes Xiphon Interceptors
2x Adeptus Astartes Storm Eagles
3x Asuryani Nightwings
3x Asuryani Phoenix Bombers

The set also includes a 38-page rulebook featuring the following information:

The full Aeronautica Imperialis game rules, including how to build your force using Squadron Lists, perform Ace Manoeuvres, field different classes of aircraft, and unleash ground defences. Learn how to manoeuvre your aircraft, adjust their altitude, and change speed while avoiding the risks of stalling and breaking up. There are even rules for special manoeuvres including landing, taxiing, and taking off.


The Dogfight scenario, as well as optional rules for fighting at night or in bad weather conditions.
Squadron Lists, providing details of all of the aircraft in the box as well as their weapon options and special rules.
A reference page showing the 8 different manoeuvres aircraft can take, as well as a 2-page quick-reference guide containing the key game rules.
Wrath of Angels Starter Scenarios Booklet (including 3 additional scenarios to play)
Duble-sided Area of Engagement game mat (depicting two aerial war zones)
Quick-reference cards (containing the key game rules)
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Aeronautica Imperialis: Adeptus Astartes Cards – Aircraft and Aces

boardgame.name: Vault: A Solitaire Dice Game
Vault: Premium Artwork
boardgame.description:
Vault is a 15 minute solitaire game that you can play with 5 dice, a pencil, and game sheet.

In this game, you play as a bank robber who is trying to crack a specialized vault. Through the rolling of dice, and careful planning, you hope to get out with as many gemstones as you can before all the locks on the vault close. Some locks contain more gemstones than others, so it is up to you to decide where to spend your time. Are you the next Pink Panther? Find out in Vault: A Solitaire Dice Game!
